file_content.text: Whatever.
Don't push it.
What're you starin' at?
Your digs ain't much to look at, least it's roomy. What do you do for fun in this dump?
I'm not your hostess.
I'm not your host.
You're here to work. How you occupy your off time is your own problem.
Gonna be your problem real soon.
Honestly, I go out for my entertainment.
Not much. Sorry.
Don't think you're gonna keep me cooped up in this can with nothin' to do.
On the inside, I got bored, somebody got stabbed. Better keep me busy.
You break it, you buy it. Understand?
Don't push your luck.
Yeah, yeah, whatever.
Stick with me and you won't be short on targets.
I plan to.
That's more like it.
Whatever keeps you quiet, psycho.
Fine.
You're too kind, wimp.
Mostly I throw loud mouth ingrates out the air lock.
Stuff your complaints.
My kinda entertainment. When we gonna play a round?
Just stay out of trouble.
You're hopeless.
I'll be on my best behavior... Chump.
Housebreaking you is gonna be a real challenge.
Should have seen that coming.
Ain't been broken, ain't gonna be, chump.
Keep it up and you won't wait long.
Soon, at the rate we're going.
Don't worry. I'll treat you real gentle, girlie.
Lemme know when you find the guts, wimp.
You got somethin' to kill, or what?
This is the way to do it. Doin' what we want, when we want, ain't nobody gonna say otherwise.
Kinda glad I ain't killed you yet.
I'll take that as a compliment.
Thanks, I guess.
List of people I ain't gonna kill, is real short.
You still planning to?
What do you mean "yet"?
When I do you, it's gonna be fun don't you worry.
You mean you're glad you haven't tried.
Don't kid yourself.
I'll get around to it.
Figure I ain't goin' back to organized crime now that I got free run of the galaxy, but that don't mean I ain't got pull.
Long as I'm runnin' with you, you're Black Sun.
I'm not looking for any new obligations.
Meaning what, exactly?
Quit whinin'. You ain't gonna get bossed around.
When do I get my palace?
You're making me a crime boss?
You ain't gonna be some Hutt Cartel wimp. You want territory, go take it.
I'm not joining your gang, Skadge.
No thanks.
Wasn't askin'. I was tellin'.
All I'm sayin' is you and yours need somethin', Black Sun's got your back.
Now quit makin' a fuss before I change my mind.
You're back.
Ain't like a bunch of Hutt flunkies was gonna give me trouble.
Woulda been back sooner, but the slug an' I had a lot of catching up to do.
I assume this grudge of yours is finished.
And you settled things?
Only thing left for that Hutt is gettin' hosed off the walls.
I take it you had a good time.
Enjoy yourself?
Made 'im wish he'd traded all these years for quick death.
You had your fun, get back to work.
Vacation's over.
Was just gettin' warmed up, how 'bout we catch us a live one this time?
This is where I get off, runt.
We had a deal. I take you off Belsavis, you work for me.
You can't just take off.
I don't work for nobody. You an' me though, we ain't done yet, don't you worry.
Where are you running off to all of the sudden?
Huh?
Been waiting forever to hear that.
Music to my ears.
Hmph. Funny.
Found me that slimy Hutt I was talkin' about. He's been gettin' fat an happy all these years after crossin' me.
Time he gets what's comin' to him.
When you're finished with this, it better not come back to haunt us.
Don't make this messy for me.
When I'm finished, ain't gonna be much left.
I don't mind tagging along if you need another blaster.
Need help?
He owes me a lot of bad blood, I plan on takin' my time to bleed him. You ain't gonna rush me this time.
If you get caught, you're on your own.
Whatever.
Hah! Like I'd need a hand from a wimp like you.
Try not gettin' killed. Gonna want somethin' to do when I get back.
Hadn't noticed how much that time in the cooler cramped my style. Got me rusty.
You're keeping up.
You seem fine to me.
Hmph. Can still take half the chumps you deal with with one hand. Ain't my point.
I thought all you did all day was lift weights and pick fights.
I don't see how it could have.
Ain't so bad when there's some chump in the yard to shank or a guard station to rough up. Solitary's another story.
Wasn't aware you had a style.
At what? Being dumb?
Har har.
I'm just sayin', all this runnin' around bustin' heads is wettin' my appetite and I'm itchin' to do some real damage.
Never did get my hands on the stinkin' Hutt that tried to have me bumped off. Been thinkin' I'm overdue.
What do you expect from me?
You asking a favor?
I say I was lookin' for help?
Who are you planning to pay a visit?
This Hutt got a name?
Some slimy Hutt underboss. A nobody. Don't really remember 'im. Gotta think about it.
There any opportunities to turn a profit?
I see some business potential.
Stinkin' Hutts are usually rollin' in credits. Might cough up a few before I bleed 'im.
All you need to know is, once I find the dirty backstabber, I'm payin' 'im a visit.
I been thinkin' runnin' with you ain't so bad.
More downtime than I like, but at least it ain't like bein' in the can, too much time between killin's on the inside.
I have no intention of winding up behind bars.
I wouldn't know.
It has it's ups.
I'm guessing Belsavis wasn't the first place you did time.
End up in prison often?
I don't get pinched often, but when they got me they try an' hang on. Ain't all bad.
Working with me is slightly better then prison. Gee, thanks.
Some gratitude.
Spend half my time cooped up in that can of yours. Ain't much different, 'sides prison ain't so bad.
Best place to meet the real scum of the universe. Get connected. Lock up took me from the streets to the major leagues.
I prefer to meet my contacts through the usual channels.
I'll take your word for it.
Doin' a job don't get you leverage. Get someone on the inside to owe you, that means somethin'.
Black Sun wasn't good enough for you?
Thought you liked the streets?
I'm talkin' about when I was just gettin' started. First time I got nabbed.
So who'd you meet on the inside?
Made some friends, huh?
Yeah, you really moved up in the world.
You're still scum.
You ain't the only one that's killed movers and shakers.
Shared a cell with a Hutt Cartel gangster once. Helped him bust out, got introduced to the family.
Had a couple good years bein' an enforcer before those slimy two-faced slugs tried to bump me off.
You got crummy taste in company.
Bad enough with that skinny broad and the little twerp tryin' to walk tall.
But I don't get how that squeakin' thing and the belly achin' dandy ain't become target practice yet.
But that noisy pest of yours ain't good for nothin' but kickin' around.
But that smart talkin' phony ain't good for nothin' 'cept gettin' smashed... and not in the fun way.
The skinny broad and that little twerp tryin' to walk tall, dead weight if you ask me.
How'd a hard case like you get tangled up with such a bunch of dainties?
Just lucky I guess.
Doesn't matter.
Yeah, lucky.
It'd be a mistake to underestimate any of my crew.
You're wrong about them.
Yeah? I ain't buyin' it.
Not everyone's here to kick in teeth. Besides, I'm the only hard case this team needs.
They have uses.
Sure, so far, but you oughtta roll with a crew that ain't gonna slow you down.
None of your tagalongs woulda lasted two minutes with any of my crowd.
So you've said. Was there something else?
You done?
You wanna run with losers, ain't my problem.
I can't picture you as a people person.
You had a crowd?
Sittin' around by myself, ain't much of a party.
That's a generous estimate.
You're probably right.
Figured they'd take their time.
Had a good thing goin' back on Coruscant. Empire shook that place up real good.
No law, just unclaimed turf and millions of dregs clawin' at each other for the scraps. One big round the clock brawl. Shame it didn't last.
The Republic send in the troops?
Why didn't it?
Nah, peckin' order got sorted out, gangs formed, party ended. Still, turf wars were fun.
Anarchy has a certain appeal.
Sounds fun.
That was the best part, hands down, but turf wars weren't half bad either.
Preying on destitute refugees. You're a real big man.
That's awful.
Yeah, I am, ain't I? Helped me carve out a nice chunk of territory.
My gang was top of the pack. Black Sun were killers to the core, not like those lazy stinkin' Hutts.
Wonder what they been doin' since I got nabbed... gotta go find me somethin' to break.
Got somethin' to say once we're back on your flyin' bucket.
I got somethin' to say. Find a place to talk.
Get outta my face.
Don't care, ain't listenin'.
Yeah, yeah, lead the way.
Buzz off, I'm gettin' cozy.
You done?
Don't push it.
Let's go.
I'm gettin' bored. You don't want me gettin' bored.
Time to run amok.
Hurry it up, I'm gettin' bored.
Let's find somethin' to hurt while we wait.
Nice place. When are we gonna trash it?
I love it when they beg.
Hmm, gettin' kinda hungry.
What're we still loafin' around here for?
Heh heh. Hah! Keep 'em comin'!
I'm bored of this dump.
You ain't bad at smashin' stuff.
